title: Scrum Master in FYP project
points: Facilitated Agile ceremonies including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
Coordinated team efforts to ensure timely delivery of project milestones.
Managed the product backlog and removed impediments to optimize workflow and productivity.

title: Lead Programmer in Qientics project
points: Led the development of the core application logic using Python and Django.
Designed and implemented the database schema, developed RESTful APIs, and integrated third-party services.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain code quality.

title: Leader in Coffee Bean project
points: Conceptualized and led a team to build a mobile application for coffee enthusiasts.
Defined the project vision and managed the project timeline.
Successfully launched the app on the Google Play Store using React Native and Node.js.
